Virtue
What were Religion Love, Patriotism
Friendship — what were the scenery of
this beautiful Universe which we inhabit,
what were our consolations on this side
of the grave, & what were our aspirations
beyond it, if Poetry, did not ascend
to bring light & fire from those eternal
owl-winged faculty of
regions where the faculties which have
calculation
been opposed to it, dare not ever soar?

to be exerted according to the determination
-mination of the will. A man cannot
compose poetry
say "I will be a poet." The greatest poet
even cannot say it: for the mind in
creation is as a fading coal which
